name: Fury Wars Online - shooter
description:
A kind of arcade or just a shooter?
We don't know how to call this game's genre!
Here is Fury Wars - trash, hardcore battles!

We decided to show how cool your favorite heroes can be in funny new style you could never have imagined! Give really huge guns to each of them and arrange battles!
Not a single shooter can compete with MADNESS prevailing in this one!

You will meet a bunch of sly enemies with various unique abilities! Take care of your head, because allies can drop on it from the clouds!

It’s not a simple TPS or Moba and even not an ordinary сartoonish shooter. Black humor, absolute absurd and infinite battles are on your screen!

Fury Wars will impress you because it has:

- huge arsenal of epic guns!
Not each shooter can provide you with such waste and various armory!
Are you sick and tired of boring pistols and rifles? Cut your enemies with a Dead Unicorn, fry up with Electric trident and shove and explosive fish down the enemy's jumpsuit!

- Worldwide popular heroes in a little bit strange but TOUGH visual design!

- unique super tricks and skills for each hero!
Use super-attacks and turn your enemies into hot-dogs and mince or scare them to scream!

- popular "Escort", "Golden Rush" and "Deathmatch" modes!
Tactical or not? Who cares? Simply enjoy awesome game modes!

- competitive spirit in every battles!
Can you stand up to hordes of foes or survive in endless waves of dangerous adversaries? Try out!

This game is going to offer many features to you!

Remember, this shooting game is not like all you’ve used to play…
